qas.question: How many types of minerals are found in Nanjing?
Which minerals comprise 40 percent of those in the province?
For what mineral reserve does Nanjing rank first in both East Asia and the South East Asia areas?
What are Nanjing's main water sources?
What hot spring is in Jiangning?

context: Nanjing is endowed with rich natural resources, which include more than <a0_0>40<a0_0/> kinds of minerals. Among them, <a1_0>iron and sulfur<a1_0/> reserves make up 40 percent of those of Jiangsu province. Its reserves of <a2_0>strontium<a2_0/> rank first in East Asia and the South East Asia region. Nanjing also possesses abundant water resources, both from <a3_0>the Yangtze River and groundwater<a3_0/>. In addition, it has several natural hot springs such as <a4_0>Tangshan Hot Spring<a4_0/> in Jiangning and Tangquan Hot Spring in Pukou.
